content.webTitle: Klinsmann to consider four more years

fields.headline: Klinsmann to consider four more years
fields.bodyText: Jürgen Klinsmann will consider staying on as coach if his team make progress. "It all depends on whether we reap the rewards," he said. "I can well imagine hanging on for two or even four years after the World Cup." His captain Michael Ballack sat out training yesterday with a slight calf strain. Germany open the tournament against Costa Rica on Friday.
